医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学家将小鼠皮肤细胞转化为功能性卵子俄勒冈健康与科学大学的新研究描述了一种有前景的技术背后的科学原理，该技术可以通过将皮肤细胞转化为能够产生可行胚胎的卵子来治疗不孕症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240309/Scientists-transform-skin-cells-into-function-eggs-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240309/Scientists-transform-skin-cells-into-function-eggs-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=958f2351-0008-449d-b794-6334e059d642 Sat, 09 Mar 2024 03:00:59 -0500 Scientists transform skin cells into functional eggs in mice
研究人员利用解旋酶抑制剂开辟了对抗病毒和癌症的新途径解旋酶是解旋 DNA 和 RNA 的酶。它们是细胞生命的核心，与许多癌症和感染有关，而且，可惜的是，它们很难用药物靶向。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240309/Researchers-forge-new-path-to-combat-viruses-and-cancers-with-helicase-inhibitors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240309/Researchers-forge-new-path-to-combat-viruses-and-cancers-with-helicase-inhibitors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b45cccb0-b111-49e9-bab5-f58c17cbfd51 Sat, 09 Mar 2024 02:35:56 -0500 Researchers forge new path to combat viruses and cancers with helicase inhibitors
创意游戏课程为新父母提供强有力的支持一项新的研究发现，社会规定的创造性游戏有助于儿童及其父母发展新技能并促进福祉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240309/Creative-play-sessions-offer-powerful-support-for-new-parents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240309/Creative-play-sessions-offer-powerful-support-for-new-parents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06e1a73d-0bcc-4694-b4ff-496c25c67422 Sat, 09 Mar 2024 02:28:00 -0500 Creative play sessions offer powerful support for new parents
确定保护女性免受脂肪肝疾病的关键蛋白质瑞典卡罗林斯卡学院的新研究表明雌激素如何预防 MASLD，这是一种脂肪肝疾病，在当前肥胖流行期间急剧增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240309/Key- Protein-identified-in-protecting-women-from-fatty-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240309/Key- Protein-identified-in-protecting-women-from-fatty-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2321afc1-ee04-4747-9334-b91477a09e7f Sat, 09 Mar 2024 02:19:19 -0500 Key protein identified in protecting women from fatty liver disease
关于大脑情绪处理中心的新见解我们的情绪在多大程度上取决于我们的感官？当我们听到可怕的尖叫声、看到怪异的阴影或闻到险恶的气味时，我们的大脑和身体是否会做出同样的反应？听到欢快的音乐或看到色彩缤纷的风景会带来同样的快乐吗？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240309/New-insights-on-the-brains-emotional-processing-center.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240309/New-insights-on-the-brains-emotional-processing-center.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dcec5077-95c0-412e-bef5-05cf63287b56 Sat, 09 Mar 2024 02:06:26 -0500 New insights on the brain's emotional processing center
研究人员开发出针对艾滋病毒 Nef 蛋白的精确药物密歇根大学研究人员团队在实验室中成功修饰了一种天然存在的化合物，产生了具有抗艾滋病毒活性的先进先导化合物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240309/Researchers-develop-precise-drugs-to-target-HIVs-Nef- Protein.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240309/Researchers-develop-precise-drugs-to-target-HIVs-Nef- Protein.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c0957b9-cba5-4c4c-a8c7-36a4352752c7 Sat, 09 Mar 2024 01:55:52 -0500 Researchers develop precise drugs to target HIV's Nef protein
研究揭示了 FOXO1 对血管发育的影响人体血管系统是一个复杂的血管网络，在维持健康方面发挥着至关重要的作用。了解血管发育的分子机制对于解决与年龄相关的疾病非常重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240309/Study-unravels-FOXO1s-influence-on-blood-vessel-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240309/Study-unravels-FOXO1s-influence-on-blood-vessel-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cfef79e9-db4a-44ec-9867-d99a5da415b9 Sat, 09 Mar 2024 01:45:23 -0500 Study unravels FOXO1's influence on blood vessel development
粮食不安全加剧拉丁裔儿童脂肪肝加州大学旧金山分校领导的一项新研究发现，对于拉丁裔儿童来说，4 岁时无法可靠地获取食物会使他们在童年后期患脂肪肝的几率增加近四倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240309/Food-insecurity-fuels-fatty-liver-disease-in-Latinx-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240309/Food-insecurity-fuels-fatty-liver-disease-in-Latinx-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa5a4e6a-ad11-4832-a3ec-00b2e56d69b2 Sat, 09 Mar 2024 01:35:59 -0500 Food insecurity fuels fatty liver disease in Latinx kids
代谢综合征会增加感染高危 HPV 女性的死亡风险约克大学健康学院的研究人员利用美国十多年来对患者进行的大规模数据跟踪发现，同时患有代谢综合征和人乳头状瘤病毒 (HPV) 高危株的女性的死亡风险是未患有代谢综合征的女性的 2.6 倍无论哪种情况，都表明在涉及 HPV 相关癌症时需要关注慢性疾病合并症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240309/Metabolic-syndrome-increases-mortality-risk-in-women-with-high-risk-HPV.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240309/Metabolic-syndrome-increases-mortality-risk-in-women-with-high-risk-HPV.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c47b590-dca1-4b6f-8073-43022771a042 Sat, 09 Mar 2024 01:18:18 -0500 Metabolic syndrome increases mortality risk in women with high-risk HPV
研究揭示PD-1功能的关键机制一项新的研究表明，对免疫细胞表面受体 PD-1 工作原理的深入了解，揭示了如何加强限制其作用的治疗方法，以提高其抗癌效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240309/Study-reveals-key-mechanism-of-PD-1-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240309/Study-reveals-key-mechanism-of-PD-1-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eba6eab9-266e-4af7-9ddb-e9c844d4550a Sat, 09 Mar 2024 01:01:00 -0500 Study reveals key mechanism of PD-1 function
